doc:
Danny Trejo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danny_Trejo 0 Danny Trejo (; Spanish: [ˈtrexo]; born May 16, 1944) is an American actor who has appeared in numerous Hollywood films, often as villains and antiheroes. His films include Heat (1995), Con Air (1997), and Desperado (1995), the last with frequent collaborator Robert Rodriguez. Trejo is perhaps most recognized as the character Machete, originally developed by Rodriguez for the Spy Kids series of movies and later expanded into Trejo's own series of films aimed at a more adult audience. He has appeared in TV shows such as Breaking Bad, The X-Files, King of the Hill, The Flash, and Sons of Anarchy. Danny_Trejo ( ; Spanish : [_ˈtrexo_] ; born May_16_,_1944 ) is an_American_actor who has_appeared in numerous_Hollywood_films , often as villains_and_antiheroes . His_films include Heat_(_1995_)_,_Con_Air_(_1997_) , and Desperado_(_1995_) , the_last with frequent_collaborator_Robert_Rodriguez . Trejo is_perhaps_most_recognized as the_character Machete , originally_developed by Rodriguez for the_Spy_Kids_series of movies and later expanded into Trejo 's_own_series of films aimed at a_more_adult_audience . He has_appeared in TV_shows such_as Breaking Bad , The_X-Files , King of the_Hill , The_Flash , and Sons of Anarchy .
